The largest pizza has a total surface area of 1261.65 m2 and was prepared by Dovilio Nardi, Andrea Mannocchi, Marco Nardi, Matteo Nardi and Matteo Giannotte (all Italy) in Rome, Italy, on 13 December 2012.

The largest human mattress dominoes was achieved at an event organized by Stylution Intl (China) Corp., and Ayd Group (China) in Wuhan, Hubei, China, on 23 July 2016. The attempt lasted 14 minutes and 47 seconds.

The largest playing card structure was a replica of The Venetian® Macao, The Plaza® Macao and Sands Macao. It measured 10.39 m long, 2.88 m tall and 3.54 m wide, and was created by Bryan Berg (USA) in Macau, China, on 10 March 2010.
Underwater cyclist Homar Leuci from Italy travels record distance on static bike in one breath - Guinness World Records Italian Show

The most coconuts smashed around a person while blindfolded in one minute and was achieved by Karamjit Singh and Kawaljit Singh (both India) on the set of Lo Show dei Record in Milan, Italy, on 25 July 2014.
The most push-ups using the backs of the hands in one hour was set by Paddy Doyle (UK) at Staminas Boxing Self Defence Gym in Erin Go Bragh Sports Centre, Birmingham, UK, on 8 November 2007
The longest distance pulled by a horse while on full body burn was achieved by Josef Todtling (Austria) in Teichalm-Fladnitz, Styria, Austria, on 27 June 2015.
The longest domino wall is 40.14 metres, achieved by Tulln Domino Team (Austria), in Tulln, Austria, on 22 March 2016.
The greatest distance travelled with a pool cue on the chin set by Ashrita Furman (USA) at the Joe Austin Playground in Jamaica, New York, USA, on 6 July 2008.
The most roof tiles broken in one minute (female) was achieved by Lisa Dennis (UK) on the set of Lo Show dei Record in Milan, Italy, on 11 July 2014.

The fastest 50 metres walking on hands with a football (soccer ball) between the legs was achieved by Zhang Shuang (China) at the China West Normal University, in Nanchong, Sichuan, China on 30 April 2016.
The most pull ups in 24 hours (female) was achieved by Eva Clarke (Australia) at Al Wahda Mall in Abu Dhabi, UAE on 10 March 2016.
Largest collection of Star Wars memorabilia.Steve Sansweet (USA) has amassed an estimated unique items at Rancho Obi-Wan in northern California, USA.
The most rotations hanging from a power drill in a minute achieved by The Huy Giang (Germany) on the set of Guinness World Records, in Madrid, Spain, on 23 December 2008.
Most drink cans crushed with elbow in one minute achieved by martial arts expert Muhammad Rashid from Pakistan.
Worlds longest golf putt. Brett Stanford managed the historical shot at the Point Walter Golf Course, Western Australia.
The most hula hoops spun simultaneously was achieved by Marawa Ibrahim in Los Angeles, USA, on 25 November 2015.
The largest collection of Guinness World Records memorabilia is owned by Martyn Tovey (UK) of Radstock, UK. The achievement was verified on 25 September 2014.
The longest duration balancing on four fingers was achieved by Wang Weibao (China) on the set of Zheng Da Zong Yi, China, on 9 November 2008.
At the annual Gelatimo ice-cream festival in Forno di Zoldo, Italy, Dimitri Panciera achieved the Guinness World Records title for the Most ice-cream scoops balanced on a cone.
Worlds largest chocolate sculpture erected in California. Created by corporate chef Francois Mellet (France, USA), the chocolate pyramid was set up at the the Qzina Institute of Chocolate and Pastry.
Most candles on a birthday cake were lit and remained burning for about 40 seconds. Taking place at the Sri Chinmoy Centre in New York.
Freediving athlete Johanna Nordblad sets record swimming under frozen lake on 14 March 2015 in Asikkala, Finland
A group of dedicated students from the University of Delhi in India have achieved a Guinness World Records title for constructing the Largest plastic cup pyramid.
About

This App has been programmed by Alexey Pidlubny. You have the possibility to contact me by sending message on my email: p.alexey.m@gmail.com Main idea of game is to guess the record. First of all you select level and then read record info, you can pick the image and it increases in size. You should enter your variant of record value. Then you will see how you were right in progress bar. To go to the next world you should collect 30 stars. I hope you have fun with this App!
Collect 30 stars to unlock World 2!\
Click on image to increase it!
